name: Crashy Asia
description:
Watch out! You play Backpacker Panda, journeying through the best part of the world: South East Asia.

Ahhh... the South Seas, the nature, the hospitable people... but the traffic?

Travellers may tell you that the driving in these parts can be unpredictable. Make sure you don't get run over!

The wide variety of vehicles will come at you from every direction.

Perhaps a famous monument may protect you, perhaps not.

Grab powerups to give you an edge!

Look out for the flavours of each country - eg the Philippines gets a Popemobile.

Artistic direction done by kids. They love the massive pile ups.

Satirical news episodes added to entertain the adults, may not go down well with the more sensitive politicians.
